description: This pretty village is located near Chorley in the county of Lancashire. It's a nice place to start a walk with woods, canals and nearby reservoirs to visit on foot. The village is also close to the West Pennine Moors where there are numerous hiking and cycling trails to try. This walk takes you south along The Goit Canal to the nearby Anglezarke Reservoir. The walk starts in the village and heads south along a pleasant waterside path running along side the Goit Canal. You'll pass the Hatch Brook Waterfall and the picturesque White Coppice where there's a cricket field and a series of small reservoirs to see. The walk continues south past the woodland and waterfalls at Strontstrey Bank before coming to the expansive Anglezarke Reservoir. Here you enter the Rivington Estate where you can explore Rivington Country Park, Rivington Pike and Rivington Reservoir .

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: Back in the village you can enjoy post walk refreshment at The Cricketers Arms. There's a good sized outdoor area here with a raised beer garden which consists of a lawned area, paved patio to the rear and a number of picnic benches. You can find them at 94 School Lane with a postcode of PR6 8QP for your sat navs.

details.subtitle: Dog Walking
details.content: The woodland and waterside trails are ideal for dog walking. The Crciketers mentioned above is also dog friendly.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: If you head north east from the village you could visit Withnall, Abbey Village Reservoir, Rake Brook Reservoir and Roddlesworth Reservoir. The long distance Witton Weavers Way can also be picked up in this area. To the north of the settlement you can pick up the Withnell Nature Reserve trail and enjoy an easy walk through an area rich with flora and fauna. For more walking ideas in the area see the West Pennine Moors Walks and the Lancashire Walks pages.

display_address: 7, Well Lane, Pike Lowe, Withnell, Brinscall, Chorley, Lancashire, England, PR6 8QX, United Kingdom
